channel.title: Metasploit on Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Metasploit on Personal Blog

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Acute
item.description:
Acute

└─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.11.145 -T4 --min-rate 10000
Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-09-27 18:20 BST
Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.145 (10.10.11.145)
Host is up (0.12s latency).
Not shown: 65534 filtered tcp ports (no-response)
PORT STATE SERVICE
443/tcp open https

139/tcp open netbios-ssn
445/tcp open microsoft-ds

|_smb-vuln-ms10-061: NT_STATUS_OBJECT_NAME_NOT_FOUND
|_smb-vuln-ms10-054: false
| smb-vuln-ms17-010:
| VULNERABLE:
| Remote Code Execution vulnerability in Microsoft SMBv1 servers (ms17-010)
| State: VULNERABLE
| IDs: CVE:CVE-2017-0143
| Risk factor: HIGH
| A critical remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft SMBv1
| servers (ms17-010).
|
| Disclosure date: 2017-03-14
| References:
| https://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2017-0143
| https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/security/ms17-010.aspx

Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 17.09 seconds
  • Right away we see that the box is vulnerable to ms17-010

Foothold/User/Root

  • Launch metasploit
    • Search for ms17_010
    • Set options
    • And launch the attack

/. (Status: 200) [Size: 1433]
/pagerror.gif (Status: 200) [Size: 2806]
/iisstart.htm (Status: 200) [Size: 1433]

2023/06/05 15:56:54 Finished
===============================================================

Foothold

  • We see a webserver
    • No results on gobuster
